@Name: Insufficient Documentation of Error Handling Techniques
Description:
The documentation does not sufficiently describe the techniques
					that are used for error handling, exception processing, or similar
					mechanisms.

Extended_Description.xhtml:p: Documentation may need to cover error handling techniques at multiple layers, such as module, executable, compilable code unit, or callable.

Submission.Submission_Comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
